divy11:8: ekasmin samaye bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrairdhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhairdevair nāgairasurairyakṣairgauḍaiḥ kinnarairmahoragairiti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavāñ jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṁ saśrāvakasaṁgho vaiśālyāṁ viharati sma markaṭasahasradatīre kūṭāgāraśālāyām |
divy11:9: tena khalu samayena vaiśālikā licchavaya idamevamrūpaṁ kriyākāramakārṣuh—pañcadaśyāṁ bhavantaḥ pakṣasya aṣṭamyāaṁ caturdaśyāṁ ca prāṇino hantavyā yatkāraṇameyurmanuṣyā māṁsamanveṣanta iti |
divy11:10: tena khalu samayena anyatamo goghātako mahāntaṁ vṛṣabhamādāya nagarānniṣkramati praghātayitum |
divy11:11: tamenaṁ mahājanakāyaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddho māṁsārthī kathayati—śīghramenaṁ vṛṣaṁ ghātaya, vayaṁ māṁsenārthina iti |
divy11:12: sa kathayati—evaṁ kariṣyāmi, kiṁ tu muhūrtamudīkṣadhvamiti |
divy11:13: tato vṛṣa īdṛśamanāryaṁ vaco duruktaṁ śrutvā bhītastrastaḥ saṁvignah āhṛṣṭaromakūpa itaścāmutaśca saṁbhrānto nirīkṣate, cintayati ca—ko māṁ kṛcchrasaṁkaṭasambādhaprāptamatrāṇamaśaraṇamiṣṭena jīvitenācchādayediti |
divy11:15: bhagavāṁśca pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṁghapuraskṛto vaiśālīṁ piṇḍāya prāviśat |
divy11:16: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṁ bhagavantaṁ dvātriṁśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṁkṛtamaśītyānuvyañjanairvirājitagātraṁ vyāmaprabhālaṁkṛtaṁ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṁ jaṅgamamiva ratnaparvataṁ samantato bhadrakamam |
divy11:21: atha sa vṛṣo bhagavatyavekṣāvān pratibaddhacittah eṣo me śaraṇamiti sahasaiva tāni dṛḍhāni varatrakāṇi bandhanāni cchittvā pradhāvan yena bhagavāṁstenopasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy11:22: upasaṁkramyobhābhyāṁ jānubhyāṁ bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya pādau jihvayā nileḍhumārabdhaḥ |
divy11:23: sa cāsya raudrakarmā goghātakaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddha eva śastravyagrahastaḥ |
divy11:24: tato bhagavāṁstaṁ raudrakarmāṇaṁ goghātakamidamavocat—kuruṣva tvaṁ bhoḥ puruṣa anena govṛṣabheṇa sārdhaṁ sātmyam |
divy11:27: tatkasya hetoh? mayā eṣa bahunā mūlyena krītaḥ |
divy11:31: atha bhagavāmllaukikacittamutpādayati—aho bata śakro devendrastrīṇi kārṣāpaṇasahasrāṇyādāyāgacchediti |
divy11:32: sahacittotpādādbhagavataḥ śakro devendraḥ kārṣāpaṇasahasratrayamādāya bhagavataḥ purastādasthāt |
divy11:33: atha bhagavāñ śakraṁ devendramidamavocat—anuprayaccha kauśika asya goghātakasya triguṇaṁ mūlyam |
divy11:35: atha goghātakaḥ kārṣāpaṇasahasrayaṁ vṛṣamūlyaṁ gṛhītvā hṛṣṭastuṣṭaḥ pramudito bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā taṁ govṛṣaṁ bandhanānmuktvā prakrāntaḥ |
divy11:36: śakro devendro bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā tatraivāntarhitaḥ |
divy11:38: atha govṛṣo gatapratyāgataprāṇo bhūyasyā mātrayā bhagavatyabhiprasanno bhagavantaṁ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddho bhagavato mukhaṁ vyavalokayamāno ’sthāt |
divy11:40: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṁ prāviṣkurvanti, tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātāḥ puṣpaparāgapadmarāgavajravaiḍūryamuasāragalvārkalohitakādakṣiṇāvartaśaṅkhaśilāpravālajātarūparajatavarṇā arciṣo mukhānniścārya kāścidadhastādgacchanti, kāścidupariṣṭādgacchanti |
divy11:41: yā adhastādgacchanti, tāḥ saṁjīvaṁ kālasūtraṁ rauravaṁ mahārauravaṁ tapanaṁ pratāpanamavīcimarbudaṁ nirarbudamaṭaṭaṁ hahavaṁ huhuvamutpalaṁ padmaṁ mahāpadmaparyantān narakān gatvā ye uṣṇanarakāsteṣu śītībhūtvā nipatanti, ye śītanarakāsteṣūṣṇībhūtvā nipatanti |
divy11:43: teṣāmevaṁ bhavati—kiṁ nu vayaṁ bhavanta itaścyutāḥ, āhosvidanyatropapannā iti |
divy11:45: teṣāṁ nirmitaṁ dṛṣṭvā evaṁ bhavati—na hyeva vayaṁ bhavanta itaścyutāḥ, nāpyanyatropapannā iti |
divy11:46: api tvayamapūrvadarśanaḥ sattvaḥ, asyānubhāvenāsmākaṁ kāraṇāviśeṣāḥ pratiprasrabdhā iti |
divy11:47: te nirmite cittamabhiprasādya tannarakavedanīyaṁ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisaṁdhir gṛhṇanti yatra satyānāṁ bhājanabhūtā bhavanti |
divy11:48: yā upariṣṭādgacchanti, tāścāturmahārājakāyikān devāṁstrāyastriṁśān yāmāṁstuṣitān nirmāṇaratīn paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhānapramāṇābhānābhāsvarān parīttaśubhānapramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnānanabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalānabṛhānatapān sudṛśān sudarśanānakaniṣṭhaparyantān devān gatvā anityaṁ duḥkhaṁ śūnyamanātmetyuddhoṣayanti |
divy11:49: gāthādvayaṁ bhāṣante— ārabhadhvaṁ niṣkrāmata yujyadhvaṁ buddhaśāsane |
divy11:54: atha tā arciṣastrisāhasramahāsāhasraṁ lokadhātumanvāhiṇḍya bhagavantameva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti |
divy11:55: tadyadi bhagavānatītaṁ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati, bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhato ’ntardhīyante |
divy11:67: atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṁ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata ūrṇāyāmantarhitāḥ |
divy11:69: athāyuṣmānānandaḥ kṛtakarapuṭo bhagavantaṁ papraccha— nānāvidho raṅgasahasracitro vaktrāntarānniṣkasitaḥ kalāpaḥ |
divy11:71: gāthāṁ ca bhāṣite— vigatodbhavā dainyamadaprahīṇā buddhā jagatyuttamahetubhūtāḥ |
divy11:73: tatkālaṁ svayamadhigamya dhīra buddhyā śrotṛrṇāṁ śramaṇa jinendra kāṅkṣitānām |
divy11:76: yasyārthe smitamupadarśayanti dhīrā staṁ śrotuṁ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ (6)|
divy11:80: nāhetvapratyayamānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ smitaṁ prāviṣkurvanti |
divy11:81: dṛṣṭaste ānanda ayaṁ govṛṣah? dṛṣṭo bhadanta |
divy11:82: eṣa ānanda govṛṣastathāgatasyāntike prasannacittaḥ saptame divase kālaṁ kṛtvā cātrumahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapatsyate |
divy11:94: tadanayā saṁtatyā navanavatikalpasahasrāṇi vinipātaṁ na gamiṣyati |
divy11:95: tataḥ kāmāvacareṣu deveṣu divyaṁ sukhamanubhūya paścime bhave paścime nikete samucchraye paścime ātmabhāvapratilambhe manuṣyatvaṁ pratilabhya rājā bhaviṣyati aśokavarṇo nāma cakravartī caturarṇavāntavijetā dhārmiko dharmarājaḥ saptaratnasamanvāgataḥ |
divy11:97: tadyathā—cakraratnaṁ hastiratnamaśvaratnaṁ maṇiratnaṁ strīratnaṁ gṛhapatiratnaṁ pariṇāyakaratnameva saptamam |
divy11:98: pūrṇaṁ cāsya bhaviṣyati sahasraṁ putrāṇāṁ śūrāṇāṁ vīrāṇāṁ varāṅgarūpiṇā parasainyapramardakānām |
divy11:100: so ’pareṇa samayena dānāni datvā cakravartirājyamapahāya keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi …ṣamyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṁ pravrajya pratyekāṁ bodhiṁ sākṣātkariṣyati, aśokavarṇo nāma pratyekabuddho bhaviṣyati |
divy11:101: athāyuṣmānānandaḥ kṛtakarapuṭo bhagavantaṁ papraccha—kiṁ bhadanta anena govṛṣeṇa karma kṛtam yena tiryagyonāvupapannaḥ, kiṁ karma kṛtam yena divyamānuṣasukhamanubhūya pratyekāṁ bodhimadhigamiṣyati? bhagavānāha—anenaiva ānanda govṛṣeṇa karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasambhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavatpratyupasthitānyavaśyambhāvīni |
divy11:103: ko ’nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na hyānanda karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāśubhāni ca |
divy11:105: sāmagrīṁ prāpya kālaṁ ca phalanti khalu dehinām (7)|
divy11:106: bhūtapūrvamānanda atīte ’dhvani ekanavate kalpe vipaśyī nāma samyaksambuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṁ buddho bhagavān |
divy11:107: sa bandhumatīṁ rājadhānīmupaniśritya viharati, anyatamasmin vanaṣaṇḍe |
divy11:109: sarve ca vītarāgā vigatadveṣā vigatamohā yāvat pañcamātrāṇi dhūrtakaśatāni tena tenāhiṇḍyamānāni taṁ pradeśamanuprāptāni |
divy11:110: teṣāmetadabhavat—ete hi pravrajitā mahātmānah īdṛśeṣu sthāneṣvabhiramante |
divy11:111: yadyeṣāṁ jīvitopacchedaṁ na kariṣyāmaḥ, na bhūya etasmin pradeśe svasthairvihartavyaṁ bhaviṣyati |
divy11:112: yadyapyete mahātmānaḥ sarvasattvahitodayapravṛttā na pareṣāmārocayiṣyanti, tathāpyeṣāṁ pradhānapuruṣā upasaṁkramiṣyanti |
divy11:116: sa kathayati—aghātayitvā etān kutaḥ kṣema iti? taiste jīvitādvyaparopitāḥ |
divy11:118: yadbhūyasā tu narakeṣu tiryagyonau upapannāśca santo nityaṁ śastreṇa praghātitāḥ |
divy11:119: tatra yo ’sau caurasteṣāṁ samādāpakaḥ, sa evāyaṁ govṛṣaḥ |
divy11:120: tasya karmaṇo vipākena iyantaṁ kālaṁ na kadācit sugatau upapannaḥ |
divy11:121: yatpunaridānīṁ mamāntike cittaṁ prasāditam, tasya karmaṇo vipākena divyaṁ mānuṣaṁ sukhamanubhūya pratyekāṁ bodhimadhigamiṣyati |
divy11:122: evaṁ hi ānanda tathāgatānāṁ cittaprasādo ’pyacintyavipākaḥ, kiṁ punaḥ praṇidhānam |
divy11:123: tasmāttarhi ānanda evaṁ śikṣitavyam yatstokastokaṁ muhūrtamuhūrtamantato ’cchaṭāsaṁghātamātramapi tathāgatamākārataḥ samanusmariṣyāmītyevaṁ te ānanda śikṣitavyam |
divy11:125: athāyuṣmān ānando bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyānandyānumodya bhikṣūṇāṁ purastādgāthā bhāṣate— aho nāthasya kāruṇyaṁ sarvajñasya hitaiṣiṇaḥ |
divy11:127: āpanno hi paraṁ kṛcchraṁ govṛṣo yena mocitaḥ |
divy11:128: vyākṛtaśca bhave divye pratyekaśca jino hyasau (9)|
